name: Juelz T.
content: There is no worst way to start a weekend... It is Saturday morning and you drop your new phone and completely shatter your phone! :(When I first started to search for a repair provider, I came to discover that they were not available, have run out of the supplies, or simply don't respond.  On the contrary to that, Jacob with Mobile iPhone iPad screen repair was our light at the end of the tunnel. We need our phone repaired today, and he is able to accommodate and fit us in! Once we meet up, with Jacob, he's amazing! He is friendly, professional, and fast! He did an amazing job repairing our phone!! So if you find yourself in a pinch like us, Jacob is the guy to contact!!  Thank you, Jacob!! Hopefully I don't need my iPhone 7 or 7s repair in the future!  :)

name: Dorian E.
content: it's a Saturday evening. I'm watching the sunset at Cardiff beach, when I have the bright idea to get a time lapse of said sunset on my iPhone 6 Plus. cool right? until you prop it up without any support, & get a text, vibrates, & falls, boom. cracked screen. this happened at 7:20pm. so what do I do? hop on Yelp to see who can fix my phone. everyone is either closing soon, or already closed. come across Jacob & his company, it says 24/7.  24/7 huh? so I call this guy, & ask him when can get get me in for this broke phone of mine. he says, 3pm tomorrow. I tell him, cmon bro, I can't be out here looking reckless. can you fit me in tonight? now I'm in del mar, & he says if you can meet me in santee at 8, I got you. ok. bet. head down to santee at this little Starbucks. side note. there was a guy in there on his laptop play WOW, & talking to his bros. thought that was funny. anyways, here's my man Jake sitting, looking like Morpheus from the matrix. lol. tools and parts, ready to go. this guy is a wizard. screws stick to the screw driver via magnets, & he's doing this screen replacement like a one man nascar pit crew. 730 screen is cracked. 830 phone looks like new. not to mention, he threw on a screen protector for free as well. oh, and my friend, her screen is cracked too, she opted not to get it fixed tonight. Jake really cares, & put on a screen protector on her phone as well, for free, to prevent further damage. now if that's not good service, idk what is. I don't plan on breaking my phone anytime soon, again, but I will deff be sending any one and everyone I know who needs repair, his way.

name: Erik S.
content: Jacob and Devin came to my place of work, which was really handy because of the long hours I usually have to work.  Within 20 minutes they had my iPhone up and running again, and their prices were no more than what a retail location would charge.  And I didn't even have to go anywhere or go back later to pick up.

name: Cynthia B.
content: After having a newborn and visiting family it's not as easy to run errands. And fixing my phone was the last thing on my list. But, after finding this service and receiving a quick reply from Jacob I decided to move this up my list.Pros:-cheaper than brick and mortar locations -easy to schedule -comes to you! (Came to us in Poway)-fixed in less than 10 minutesCons: None!Highly recommend

name: Mari V.
content: I dropped my phone on a Friday afternoon and less than 24 hours later you would never know. Jacob was amazing. He answered right away and scheduled my appointment. Jacob is friendly, professional and finished the job  before my toddler finished his first round at the park. Oh and he also gave me a complimentary screen protector!

name: Rachel C.
content: Jacob once again came to the rescue for my shattered screen. He was super flexible with scheduling, was able to come earlier than scheduled, and was very professional while working. I still love how he comes to you! No dealing with store hours, having to take off work, having my phone sent out. This is just a great service! I can't see using anyone else for my iDisasters! Thanks again, Jacob!

name: Linda P.
content: Two men came to the house, right on time, and quickly replaced my iPhone screen. They were polite and professional. Thank you!

name: John H.
content: This is how you build a business, folks. Be professional. Be on time. Be friendly. And be good at what you do.And these gents are doing it right. They responded to my quote request almost immediately. They arrived early to the appointment. They were friendly. And they were quick to repair the broken screen. And they offered extra phone protection with a glass screen cover.You may find a (slightly) cheaper repair. You may find someone available immediately. But you won't find this service and value elsewhere.And yes, I am typing this review on my cell phone. I can do that now that the gentlemen have repaired the cracked screen.John

name: Rita T.
content: I cracked my screen about a week ago I been debating to wait until the weekend to get it fixed and then I came across Mobile iRepair of SD. And right away I had an appointment scheduled the next day and they came to my work to repair my screen. Yay. I was amazed of how fast and professional they are. They fixed my phone within 15 minutes came to work. Best customer service ever.Thanks Jacob and Devin. You guys are amazing !!!

name: Beth F.
content: So glad that I found Jacob and Devin today on yelp with their Mobile iRepair of SD.  I was in the middle of preparing dinner at my home for a large party and dropped my iPhone 6 on the hard floor.  I was hesitate to have them come to my house but they were have wonderful customer service and very polite.  I found them on yelp and I am glad that I did.  Thank you very much for fixing my phone so fast and allowing me to have the time to go back and finish preparing for tonight's feast!

name: Patrick N.
content: It was during my trip when I dropped my phone and the screen cracked. Luckily I found this service on yelp and gave them a call. I gave them the address to my work place and they were able to come to me to fix my phone. I love how convenient they were and it only took 10 min to have my screen fixed. To fix my iPhone 6 was $110 which is not bad given how great their service was. Highly recommend them.

name: Holly D.
content: I highly recommend these guys!  I shattered my iPhone 6 screen last night.  I was researching what to do and originally contacted another company...who didn't pick up their phone or return my email for a few hours.  I saw Jacob's company on Yelp and he answered my call right away.  He was very pleasant and and said he could be at my house in an hour.  He was able to fix my screen right away and couldn't be nicer.  His prices were in line with other companies but it was great he came to me (no extra charge), was responsive and used Apple parts.  Thanks!

name: Jeff D.
content: Showed up early and fixed my screen quickly for a fair price! What more can you ask for?

name: Lisa H.
content: They did a great job, called them and had my phone fixed within the thirty minutes.Thanks

name: William H.
content: So the wife dropped the IPad Mini getting our son out of the car. As she is flying out tomorrow, we needed an immediate repair so our son can use on the plane. Jacob and Devin came to house and replaced the screen flawlessly. They called and said they would be early which was awesome. Great customer service!! Great price and they come to you for no additional charge. Highly recommended for your repairs.

name: jay c.
content: From the moment I called these guys were on it. I called them, they picked up on the first ring, set a time to come by, and even showed up early, but of course called ahead. Very reliable and great customer service. Wish i broke my phone more often, as these guys run a solid service, and would recommend them to anyone.

name: Georgia M.
content: These guys are the best! Crazy reasonable pricing for repairs! Fast, reliable and honest. They are a pleasure to work with too! Give them a call...don't delay and get your screen fixed today!

name: Susan C.
content: This is the second time that I have used their service and could not be more pleased. Their prices are reasonable, they come to you and get the job done quickly. I highly recommend them for professional/friendly service and high quality repairs. They are the type of people that you do not mind having in your home. I would recommend them to anyone looking for a repair.

name: Kishore L.
content: While I was looking for someone to fix the broken screen of my wife's iPhone 6plus, I came across numerous options on Yelp. Thanks to the "Request quote" feature , I was able to fan out a quote request to multiple vendors. The first response that I got , within a minute , was from Jacob. And none of the others were able to beat the price quoted by JacobThe fact that they offer a mobile repair service was an added bonus considering our unpredictable schedules. Set up an appointment for next day at my workplace. Jacob and Devin showed up a bit earlier in fact They were extremely professional , knowledgable ,got down to work without wasting a second. And replaced the broken screen in a jiffy. Also offered a tempered glass protector for a discount. The phone looked neat and new but I noticed some lines showing up when the screen was black. I just called them again to check if anything was wrong. They absolutely didn't mind coming back and checked once again. I really appreciate the honesty of these guys for I'm sure 9/10 times I would have gotten a response that it was an existing fault with the phone if I had gone else where to fix the screen. Jacob did admit it was a problem with the screen(albeit the first instance for a 6 plus screen )and instantly replaced with another one without any issuesOn the whole it was a smooth process and would definitely seek out these guys if anything untoward happens to our phones  in the future

name: Michael R.
content: These guys were friendly and efficient with my time and service. I would recommend them all day and frequently for your electronic repair needs!!!! All while I was on lunch so fast and happy to serve you!
